channel.title: [Freeware] TeraCopy
channel.description: Don't you ever get tored of seeing the time in your copy window jumping from a few millenia to a few minutes in a matter of seconds and back when you run the smallest application? Well, that can all be over TODAY! Download TeraCopy which is a freeware program which replaces your normal file copying window, it offers accurate iformation and a whole lot of additional function! http://www.codesector.com/teracopy.asp

item.title: [Freeware] TeraCopy
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

Omg yes, i was copying cs 1.6 from my school to my flash drive, and it was like “2 hours remaining” I’m like FUCK THAT SHIT I’M OUTTA HERE LOL.

Read full topic

item.title: [Freeware] TeraCopy
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

Not for downloads, but it’s way more accurate than normal copy window, it’s not like it startes at 4 hours and then jumps to 30 minutes or anything…
Also allows you to for example rename files with the same name as the ones that are present and such

Read full topic

item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

And by the way you mean accurate, it tells you exactly how much time is left?
